name: tutorial 1 - add two numbers together
code:
; set ax register to 5
; pseudocode:
; AX = 5
mov ax, 5

; set bx register to 5
mov bx, 17

; adds ax and bx registers together and stores result in ax register
; pseudocode:
; AX = AX + BX
add ax, bx

; -------------------
; to run all the code till the end, press 'run' button
